note:
Part time parent, part time wishful gamer, part time film and tv enthusiast, full time disabled with Myalgic Encephalomyelitis/chronic fatigue syndrome (#MECFS). Formerly lots of things.

Please note that #BrainFog may confuddle some of my posts, so please be patient, lemme know about mistakes, and feel free to make jokes as long as they're really funny.

Central Oregon, USA

If I favorite/star/like a post it means I see you, laugh, listen, or send support your way.
